div.p: Constellation Schools provides every child an opportunity to obtain an excellent education built on a foundation of character education for life long success.

p.span: Please click the following link to view weekly updates, assignments, and other information provided by your teachers. There's also access to a virtual career fair.

strong.span:
Call Center for COVID-19/Coronavirus
Ohio Department of Health
1-833-4-ASK-ODH
strong.br:
Open seven days a week from 9:00 AM - 8:00 PM
For the general public regarding questions about Coronavirus

strong.span:
COVID CareLine for Mental Health Support
Ohio Department of Mental Health and Addiction Services
1-800-720-9616
strong.br:
Open seven days a week from 8:00 AM - 8:00 PM
This toll-free, confidential careline provides emotional support to individuals who may be struggling to cope with current challenges in their lives.

br.span: Please click the following link to view resources provided by the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention and the Ohio Department of Health regarding the Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19), including multilingual resources.
Please click the following link to view information and resources provided by Constellation Schools to assist your family during the school closure.

div.h1: From the Desk of Principal Flood...

img.title: Mr. Flood, Principal
img.style: float: right; margin-left: 5px; left: 408px; width: 24%; height: 33%;

div.p: Welcome to Constellation Schools: Elyria Community's webpage! Parents tell us we are the “best-kept secret” in Elyria. Let me take this opportunity to introduce our school to you and share with you who we are and why we exist as the premier public charter school in Elyria. Elyria Community School (ECS) opened its doors in 2001 with 75 students in grades K-3 and has grown to two locations with nearly 500 students. We are very proud of this growth and proud of the opportunity to offer our outstanding school as a tuition-free educational option for the families of Elyria and the surrounding communities.

ECS is a public charter school and as such we meet and exceed the requirements of the Ohio Department of Education with regard to our curricular offerings, our teaching staff and all programming. Constellation Schools: Elyria Community, is one of the very few schools in Lorain County receiving the Ohio Department of Education Momentum Award for THREE CONSECUTIVE YEARS! As a momentum award winner, Constellation Schools: Elyria Community exceeded student growth expectations in English language arts and mathematics, and earned straight A’s on all Value-Added measures of the State Report Card for the 2016, 2017, and 2018 school year.

We encourage you to learn more about Elyria Community School by calling our school office or stopping in for a tour at either our elementary or middle school locations. We can also put you in touch with parent representatives from our school who will give you the “inside scoop” on who we are. Check us out and consider becoming part of the school choice community.
Please feel free to contact me at 440-365-0390 or email me at flood.thomas@constellationschools.com to take a tour and learn more about Constellation Schools: Elyria Community!

p.br: SaferOH tip line will allow students and adults to anonymously share information with school officials and law enforcement about threats to student safety - whether that involved threatened mass incident or harm of a single student.

a.title: Last Day of School for Students
a.span: Last Day of School for Students

div.p: Constellation Schools: Elyria Community does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, disability, or age in its programs and activities and provides equal access to the Boy Scouts and other designated youth groups. The following person has been designated to handle inquiries regarding non-discrimination policies:
